document_data.mainbody: '''''The Legend of Drizzt: Exile''''' (original title: '''''Forgotten Realms: The Legend of Drizzt, Volume 2: Exile'''''; reissued title: '''''Dungeons & Dragons: Forgotten Realms: The Legend of Drizzt, Volume 2: Exile''''') is the graphic novel version of [[R.A. Salvatore]]'s novel ''[[Exile]]''. It was originally published in three parts: ''The Legend of Drizzt: Exile'' #1–3.

document_data.Reprints: The ''The Legend of Drizzt: Exile Graphic Novel'' series was reprinted in 2006 as a paperback and hardcover omnbius by [[wikipedia:en:Devil's Due Publishing|Devil's Due Publishing]]. It was released as a paperback omnibus in August 2015 by [[wikipedia:en:IDW Publishing|IDW Publishing]].
